response.original_title: Night At The Museum: Creepy Crawlies
response.overview: Join Jericho Comedy as they take over Oxford's Museum of Natural History for a stand-up comedy show all about insects. Join us for an exclusive late night event at Oxford's Museum of Natural History. This is a comedy night at the museum. This is Jericho Comedy's 5th live show at the natural history museum. It will be entirely focussed on insects, arachnids, and creepy crawlies! Imagine jokes about June bugs, material about mayflies, banter about beetles, riffs on roaches. Join us as we curate our finest award winning line-up of comedians and experts to write custom sets on the wonderful world of bugs, for an hour long stand-up show! This show is a part of the museum's insect outreach programme. This is a completely unique evening guaranteed to be the bees knees.
response.title: Night At The Museum: Creepy Crawlies
